sealed.translation[0].definitions[0].def: shut or protected with something that prevents air, water etc from getting in or out
sealed.translation[0].definitions[1].def: sealed documents are closed so that they can only be read by a certain person or at a certain time
sealed.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: Sealed bids  (=offers to pay a particular price for something) should be sent to Richard Walker.
sealed.translation[0].note_box[0].sectio: The box was firmly sealed with tape.
The bag is completely sealed and airtight.
Inside, police found hermetically sealed cabinets full of marijuana.
Jenkins handed Talbot a sealed envelope.
The specimens he collected were sent back to London in sealed containers.
